title: Under a Halloween Moon
description:
In this Dateline classic, a couple in love and a party bus full of passengers clash during a pre-Halloween celebration. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on October 25, 2013.

Additional Footage: WDAZ-TV, Devil's Lake, ND
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
